title: DEVICE FOR LOCKING A HOUSEHOLD APPLIANCE DOOR
fig_desc: FIG. 1 illustrates a top sectional view of an embodiment of a device for closing a door of a household appliance in a rest position, in which the door is open, according to the present invention
all_fig_descs: FIG. 1 illustrates a top sectional view of an embodiment of a device for closing a door of a household appliance in a rest position, in which the door is open, according to the present invention
